resources.string:
Collection of Personally Identifiable Information
• We collect information from you when you place an order or subscribe to our website. When ordering or registering on our site, as appropriate, you may be asked to enter your: name, e-mail address, mailing address, phone number, or credit card information. Our primary goal in doing so is to provide you a safe, efficient, smooth, and customized experience. The information we learn from customers helps us personalize and continually improve your experience of shopping from our web store.

Use of Demographic / Profile Data
• We use personal information to provide the services you request. To the extent we use your personal information to market to you, we will provide you the ability to opt-out of such uses. We use your personal information to resolve disputes, troubleshoot problems, help promote a safe service, collect money, measure consumer interest in our products and services, inform you about online and offline offers, products, services, and updates. In our efforts to continually improve our product and service offerings, we collect and analyze demographic and profile data about our user’s activity on our Website.

Cookies
• Yes, Cookies are small files that a site or its service provider transfers to your computer’s hard drive through your Web browser (if you allow it) that enables the sites or service providers systems to recognize your browser and capture and remember certain information. We use cookies to help us remember and process the items in your shopping cart. The cookies do not contain any of your personally identifiable information.

Sharing of personal information
• Your providing the Information to Bikie and its consequent storage, collection, usage, transfer, access, or processing of the same shall not be in violation of any third-party agreement, laws, charter documents, judgments, orders, and decrees. We may disclose personal information if required to do so by law or in the good faith belief that such disclosure is reasonably necessary to respond to subpoenas, court orders, or other legal processes.

Security Precautions
• We strive to ensure the security of your Personal Information and to protect your personal information against unauthorized access or unauthorized alteration, disclosure, or destruction. Whenever you change or access your account information, we offer the use of a secure server.

Choice/Opt-Out
• We provide all users with the opportunity to opt-out of receiving non-essential (promotional, marketing-related) communications from us on behalf of our partners, and from us in general, after setting up an account. If we decide to change our privacy policy, we will post those changes on this page.

Permissions
• Identity: The identity permission allows the app to access all saved accounts on your device, as well as access and change your personal information stored on the device. By account, we mean everything you will see if you go to Settings > Accounts. There you will probably find a list that will probably contain your Google account, Facebook, WhatsApp, Skype, and many others.
• SMS: Under certain circumstances, we may send you emails and SMS messages when we feel we have an important announcement to share regarding your Service. Please note that your carrier may charge you to receive messages via SMS.
• Photos/Media/Files: Apps usually request Media and Photos permission when it needs External File Storage (either Internal or External) for storing some data, or for some features like sharing images, etc.
• Phones: The phone permission is useful for the app that allows you to place and receive calls within an app.
• Modify phone state

Your Approval
• By using the Website and/or by providing your information, you consent to the collection and use of the information you disclose on the Website in accordance with this Privacy Policy. If we decide to change our privacy policy, we will post those changes on this page.

Contact Us
If there are any questions regarding this privacy policy, you may contact us using the information below.

Effective Date: 15/12/2023

Thank you for choosing Bikie for your transportation needs. We strive to provide you with reliable and comfortable vehicles for your journey. Please review our Return and Refund Policy for vehicle rentals carefully before making a reservation.

1. Reservation Cancellation and Refunds
Customers can cancel a reservation without any charge up to 7 days prior to the scheduled pick-up time. Cancellations made within 1.24hrs of the scheduled pick-up may be subject to a cancellation fee. The specific fee will be communicated to the customer at the time of cancellation. Refunds for cancellations will be processed within 7 working days and credited to the original payment method.

2. Vehicle Return and Inspection
Upon returning the rental vehicle, it will be inspected for any damage or excessive wear. Customers are responsible for returning the vehicle in the same condition it was received, excluding normal wear and tear.

3. Refundable Security Deposit
A refundable security deposit may be required at the time of vehicle pickup. This deposit is intended to cover any additional charges, such as fuel costs, late fees, or damage to the vehicle. The deposit will be refunded after the vehicle is returned, and deductions, if any, are assessed.

4. Damage or Loss Charges
Customers are responsible for any damage to or loss of the rental vehicle during the rental period. The cost of repairs or replacement will be deducted from the security deposit. If the repair costs exceed the deposit, the customer will be billed for the remaining amount.

5. Emergency Roadside Assistance
In the event of a breakdown or mechanical issue with the rental vehicle, customers should contact our 24/7 roadside assistance hotline at [emergency contact number]. We will make every effort to provide prompt assistance or arrange for a replacement vehicle.

If you have any questions or concerns regarding our Return and Refund Policy, please contact us using the information below.

The terms and conditions of Bikie are the policies that govern the relationship between the Company and the User. These terms and conditions (as amended from time to time including all Schedules and Annexures hereto) shall constitute a legally valid and binding contract under the Applicable Laws and the use of any product Services either through Bikie’s Website or Mobile Application (hereinafter referred to as App”) by the User shall be deemed to be an acceptance of all the terms and conditions set forth herein. Users are advised to read these terms and conditions carefully before using/registering on the Website/ App or availing Services through the same. Bikie reserves the right to alter/modify/change these terms and conditions in its sole discretion, from time to time, with or without prior notice to the User. Notice of any changes shall be made by Bikie , promptly and communicated/brought to the attention of the User in such manner as it deems fit.
1. Registration Process
Every User will have to complete registration formalities as a User either through the Website/ App of Bikie. The user needs to fulfill the necessary documentation for satisfying the eligibility criteria required to become a User. Acceptance of the registration is subject to approval by Bikie at its sole discretion.
Bikie reserves the right to examine and verify the authenticity of the documentation provided by the Users.
The Users acknowledge that the registered mobile number provided during the registration shall be used for making requests for services and receiving all communications from the Company.
The User will be responsible for any action taken in pursuance of the instruction received from/sent by User mobile shall be of User and deemed to have emanated from /confirmed by the User.
2. Documents
  • For Domestic Users
  • The following documents will be needed to subscribe to a vehicle and the same needs to be uploaded and verified on our Website/App:
    • • Driving License: Original Indian Driving license is required and a learner license is not applicable.
    • • Aadhar Card/Passport: Original Aadhaar is required, and if your mobile number updated in Aadhaar is not the same as your registered mobile number, Bikie reserves the right to request for additional documents. Passport is also considered as a valid ID and address proof.
  • For International Users
  • The following documents will be needed to subscribe to a vehicle and same needs to be uploaded and verified on our Website/App :
    • • Driving License: A valid driving license from their home country along with an international driving permit is necessary.
    • • Valid visa and Passport.
  • Additionally,
  • The user should carry their original documents at the time of the pickup which were uploaded on the website/App for verification.
  • If a user is unable to verify their identity then Bikie reserve the right to deny the service and cancel the booking with the 37.5% cancellation charges as per the policy.
  • *Note:- Learner’s license is not applicable for renting a vehicle with us.
3. Payment process
The booking amount has to be paid online while making the booking on our website or App. The user has to pay the prescribed amount to avail Bikie’s service and the amount can be changed as per Bikie’s discretion. In case of any extension required, the user will have to pay the additional amount through the mobile and web application subject to availability.
  • You can use any of the options below for the payment not limited to the below mentioned :
  • • NetBanking
  • • UPI
  • • PAYTM
  • • Debit Card
  • • Credit Card.
The Payment Gateway and other transactional charges will be governed by the Government and the rules defined by the competent authorities.
Vouchers - Any voucher issued by the company will be exclusive of taxes however the tax amount will be adjusted in the next booking automatically.
4. Delay in Drop Offs
A fee of Rs. 100 along with 3X of the per hour rental charges will be charged for vehicles being returned after the grace period of 30 mins.
5. Use of Vehicle
  • The bookings have to be made by the User for their own usage and not for or on behalf of any other user. The User will be solely responsible for the usage of the vehicle and the User will be at all times responsible for the vehicle under their possession during the duration of rental. During the rental period, any breach of the terms and conditions will result in action against the User for material breach of this agreement. The company does not guarantee the availability of any vehicle at any given time however the Company promises to look after the best interest of the User. The user has to follow the under mentioned terms and conditions :
  • These scooters and motorcycles we rent are large, heavyweight and powerful and need to be handled with care. In case the rider/user is a beginner, they have to be extra careful in handling the vehicle.
  • User/Rider Age :
    • Between 18 - 20 : Will be allowed to ride any of our vehicles below 200cc, except the Yamaha R15.
    • 21 and Above : Will be allowed to ride any of our vehicles, including superbikes.
  • The rider must always wear a helmet while riding. Appropriate riding gear, i.e… Boots or closed-toe shoes, pants & eyewear is advisable.
  • For large, heavyweight and powerful vehicles riders are advised not to wear flip-flops, sandals, or shorts as it can lead to injuries.
  • Only the User/rider whose documents are submitted and verified by Bikie is permitted to use the vehicle.
  • Vehicle must be picked up and dropped off at the same location which was selected at the time of making the booking and the same cannot be modified once the booking is confirmed.
  • The user/rider is responsible for inspection of the vehicle at the pickup location and is expected to inform the Bikie executive immediately in case of any damages, malfunctions, missing parts etc.
  • All our vehicles are insured however in case required, the user/rider can opt for a separate insurance for themselves; Lessor will not be responsible for any accidental expenses of the Rider.
  • The user/rider shall use the bike entirely at their own risk and agrees that the lessor will not accept any responsibility or be held accountable for any loss, injury or death as a result of, or leading from the hire of any of the vehicles.
  • The two-wheeler will be the responsibility of the user from the time of the pick up till return. During the course of the rental, any events occurring with the vehicle or the user will be the sole responsibility of the user/rider.
  • The vehicle shall be returned back to the lessor in the same condition in which it was handed over to the user/rider.
  • In case the vehicle returned is found excessively dirty/muddy, the user/rider will have to bear the charge of washing not exceeding Rs. 200.
  • Rental package does not include Fuel, Toll, State Permits or Taxes.
  • Any incidence of traffic violation must be reported to a Bikie representative immediately.
  • User/Rider is responsible for all traffic rule violations incurred during the rental period. The user will be liable for challans/notice payments imposed due to any traffic rule violations. If the user fails to pay the challan imposed due to traffic rule violations, Bikie reserve the right to initiate necessary legal actions for recovery of the dues. The user will also be responsible for any legal expenses incurred due to the same.
  • Towing service will be borne by the customer in case of an unlikely event of tire puncture or collision or breakdown due to improper usage. In the event of mechanical or technical failure, we will take care of towing the bike at our own cost.
  • Any mechanical failures should be reported immediately to the Bikie Customer Experience Team. The User/Rider needs to take explicit permission from Bikie, before making any mechanical changes or repairs to the vehicle during the booking tenure. In case any services are carried out without explicit permission from Bikie, the costs for the same will not be refunded, and be borne entirely by the User/Rider.
  • All Bikie vehicles have GPS tracking devices; we recommend that the user follow speed guidelines – our team gets automated updates on the bikes that exceed speed limits and can penalize the user for rash driving up to Rs. 500 for every third instance of the same.
  • In case the user has left behind any personal belongings in the vehicle storage compartment, Bikie will try its best to return the same to the user; however, we cannot be held responsible for the loss of any items due to the oversight of the user.
  • In the case of EV vehicles, the company will be providing a charger along with the vehicle, however, it\'s the user\'s responsibility to charge the vehicle according to the guidelines.
6. Prohibited Uses
  • The use of a Lessor’s vehicle under the following conditions is prohibited:
  • The user agrees to use the vehicle for personal use only.
  • The user will not carry load or passenger more than the prescribed limit by the authorities.
  • Our motorcycles (Vehicles) cannot be used for rallies and rally surcharges or any format of professional or amateur competitions or for performing stunts.
  • By any person who is under the influence of (i) alcohol or (ii) any drug or medication under the effects of which the operation of a vehicle is prohibited or not recommended.
  • In carrying out any crime or any other illegal activity as deemed illegal by the LAW.
  • The user is not allowed to make any modifications, internal or external to the motorcycle. Any additional fittings on the vehicle will lead to prohibition of the user from usage of the motorcycle any further.
  • Minors will not be provided with any vehicle from Bikie and the same is expected from the users. The company will not be responsible in case the vehicle is shared with a minor.
  • Any sharp objects, weapons or illegal substances are prohibited from being carried on any Bikie vehicle.
7. Delivery Process
We will connect with the user to schedule the delivery of the vehicle. We request that the customer be present at the agreed date and time to receive the vehicle at the decided location. User/Rider should do a test ride of the bike before they accept the vehicle from the Lessor.
The Delivered vehicles cannot be rejected after handover.
Lessee can request for exchange of the vehicle if not satisfied with the vehicle condition.
Though we do quality checks at our end before delivery, the user/rider is expected to see if there are any damages and report the same to the representative of the lessor and photos shall be captured of the same.
8. Right to Refuse the Service
The company holds the right of refusal to any client not deemed fit to be served by the company or its authorized staff.
Without prejudice to its rights, claims, and contentions under the law and equity, Bikie reserves the right to terminate/suspend the Users’ registration and/or withdraw Services rendered to the User and/or levy a penalty, in the event Users indulge in using/operating the Vehicles in a manner prohibited by Bikie.
9. Damage Policy
The Lessee agrees to pay for any damage to, loss of, or any theft (disappearance) of parts of the vehicle, regardless of cause or fault. Items damaged beyond repair will be paid for at their Market Price.
The representative shall check the bike and its parts to ascertain any damage to items. Damage shall be defined as follows:
2.1.
Any damage which existed prior to the handover of the vehicle and was agreed between the lessee and lessor will not be chargeable to the Lessee.
2.2.
Tears in the seat cover will result in a charge towards a replacement of the seat cover. Opening up a stitched joint will not be chargeable.
2.3.
Any variation showing damages, if ascertained as not caused by normal wear and tear, would be charged and would have to be borne by the Lessee.
In case of an accident or collision, the users are accountable to pay a standard amount towards the accident insurance not exceeding Rs. 15,000 (which may vary depending on the severity of the damage). The members are bound to pay for the repairs incurred due to damages caused by the collision/accident.
Any charges exceeding Rs. 15,000 will be claimed from the insurance.
The above point is not valid for vehicles exceeding 200cc. In such cases, the actual repair amount must be borne by the rides/user. The insurance will only be claimed if the loss is exceeding 25% of the bike value.
In the event of a collision, either due to the fault of the rider themself or due to any other unavoidable instance, the costs involved in towing or confiscation of Bikie bikes are to be borne by the members alone.
Inactive hours during the repair period shall be charged to the user at 50% of the per-day rental amount.
10. Fuel Policy
Fuel is not included in the rental amount; we provide sufficient fuel to reach the nearest fuel station. We will not be providing a refund in case extra fuel is leftover at the time of returning the vehicle.
11. Process (Communication)
Bikie may send booking confirmation, itinerary information, cancellation, payment confirmation, refund status, schedule change, or any such other information relevant for the transaction, via SMS or by voice call on the contact number given by the User at the time of booking; Bikie may also contact the User by voice call, SMS or email in case the User couldn\'t or hasn\'t concluded the booking, for any reason whatsoever or to know the preference of the User for concluding the booking and also to help the User for the booking. The User hereby unconditionally consents that such communications via SMS and/or voice call by Bikie are
upon the request and authorization of the User,
\'transactional\' and not an \'unsolicited commercial communication\' as per the guidelines of Telecom Regulation Authority of India (TRAI) and
in compliance with the relevant guidelines of TRAI or such other authority in India and abroad. The User will indemnify Bikie against all types of losses and damages incurred by Bikie due to any action taken by TRAI, Access Providers (as per TRAI regulations) or any other authority due to any erroneous complaint made by the User against Bikie with respect to the intimations mentioned above or on account of any wrong number or email id provided by the User for any reason whatsoever.
12. Maintenance
The user is liable for checking engine oils during a trip and maintaining the vehicle while on the road. Any mechanical failures should be reported immediately. Customers may be held responsible in case of a mechanical failure resulting due to negligence of the normal maintenance while on the trip.
13. Cancellation Policy as Below:
Short Term Bookings:
No show - 100% deduction and only security deposit will be refunded
Between 0 - 6 hrs of the pick up time - 75% rental charges will be withheld, and security deposit will be refunded.
Between 6-24 hrs of the pick up time: 50% rental charges will be withheld.
Between 24-72 hrs of the pick up time: 25% rental charges will be withheld.
72 hrs or more prior to the pick up time: 10% of rental charges will be withheld.
RBX Bookings:
Before the start of the rental period – 10% of the first month’s rent will be deducted if canceled after the booking is confirmed.
During the rental period – 50% of the monthly rental amount will be deducted or the security deposit will be forfeited as applicable.
Cancellation Due to Document Issue:
37.5% of the rental amount will be deducted if:
Customer is not willing to submit the document as per the terms and conditions.
Customer is not able to verify their identity.
Customer documents are not valid.
14. Extra Charges Such as the Following Will Be Applicable -
Helmet: If a user chooses an extra helmet on the spot, it will be billed additionally on the spot.
Excess Km: The excess km charges will be calculated at the time of drop-off, and the user will be required to pay the same at the location.
Damages: Damages will be inspected at the drop-off time, and the charges will be collected on the spot as per the damage terms and conditions.
15. Refunds
Security Deposit - We have a refundable security deposit for certain vehicles. The refund of the security deposit usually takes 3-7 working days to reflect in the source account from the date of invoice after the trip has ended.
Any other refunds - Any refund processed by the company usually takes 3-7 working days.
Note - No refunds will be issued in cases of early drop-offs.
16. Over-speeding
Bikie vehicles have to be ridden within permissible limits. The speed limit for each vehicle is different, and the same is communicated on the booking summary page as well as the terms & conditions dialog box that appears before making a booking; as well as, in the booking confirmation email after the booking is made. Users must be under the speed limit specified for the vehicle or the speed limit specified by the governing authority, whichever is lesser.
All Bikie vehicles have GPS tracking devices; we recommend that the user follow speed guidelines – our team gets automated updates on the bikes that exceed speed limits and can penalize the user for rash driving up to Rs. 500 for every third instance of the same.
17. Exceeding Km Limit
Extra charge is applicable if the Km limit is exceeded by the user. Each vehicle has a different charge per km. Which is reflected in the booking summary page. The final amount will be conveyed to the customer at the time of returning the vehicle by our fleet executive, depending on the extra km used.
18. Helmet
1 complementary helmet is provided without any charge.
Extra helmets can be added while making short-term bookings. You will get an option on the summary page to select the quantity of the helmet.
Customers can rent only 2 helmets per booking.
An additional helmet will be charged as per the rates prescribed by the company.
If the helmet is damaged or lost, a charge of Rs. 900 will be levied since branded helmets will be provided to the user.
19. Use of Information
The user\'s first name and booking details may be used for showing booking popups to other users on our homepage. No other personally identifiable information will be shown.
Please read the Privacy Policy for more details regarding the use of information.


For any questions regarding our Return and Refund Policy, please contact us at:

Bikie
Plot no- 469
Pareswar sahi, collage square, Cuttack, Odisha
753003

We reserve the right to update or modify this policy at any time without prior notice. It is your responsibility to review this policy periodically for changes.

Thank you for choosing Bikie. We appreciate your business.
